topics.body: Drink. Tea is strong. Tea is bitter. Wisdom is strong. Wisdom is bitter. You see? You go to cave. Find Ghost of She. Lay ghost to rest. This your quest. Bring peace where was strife. Go!

topics.body:
Just watched "Dear Zachary: A letter to a son about his father". Holy shit, that movie was just painful to watch(in a way that is works in their favour). "Watch it here. It's in English, just with Portugese subs.":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FC2VLbpjQqM

8.5/10 Best movie I hope I will never watch again but probably will anyway because I do take interest in such cases. I dare you to watch this without crying, being depressed or at the very least, tremble like it's -40Â°C inside.

P.S: Search as little as possible. It's for the best to let the narrator speak for himself.
